text: Patti Clare (born 3 March 1976) is an English actress. She is best known for playing Mary Taylor in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 2008 onwards. She is a three-time winner of the British Soap Award for Best Comedy Performance (2011, 2013 and 2016). ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Manchester
title: Patti Clare
